section.title: How do I register to receive notifications for new blog posts?
section.p: Each blog HTML page has at the end a form in which you can fill your email address if you want to be notified when new posts are made.

section.title: Can I contribute articles to the Oxygen XML Blog?
section.p: Yes, the procedure is listed here: .

section.title: How do I learn DITA XML with Oxygen?
How do I convert various output formats to DITA XML?
Are there any productivity tips and tricks?
section.p: Our and posts contains lots of interesting productivity tips and tricks.
